readable.title: 2521062020_f8b983e4b2
readable.content: A boy getting ready as the man wearing all black straps him into a black harness to climb the wall . A man and a boy preparing to go up a climbing wall . A man holds a rope for a boy who 's about to climb a wall . A man prepares a safety harness for a boy standing before a rock climbing wall . A young boy is getting harnessed and ready to climb a manmade rock wall .
